mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_gcard(gc_name, gc_company, gc_chipset, gc_length, gc_min_power, gc_regdate, gc_price, gc_image) VALUES(#{gc_name},#{gc_company},#{gc_chipset},#{gc_length},#{gc_min_power},now(),#{gc_price},#{gc_image})
mapper.select: SELECT gc_chipset FROM p_gcard GROUP BY gc_chipset asc ORDER BY gc_chipset
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM p_gcard WHERE gc_status=0 AND gc_chipset like CONCAT('%', #{gc_chipset})) p_graphic ORDER BY gc_chipset,gc_price
